profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-27 12:06:44 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and printed material, mainly regarding Rockwell Kent.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: REEL 2033: Correspondence with Rockwell Kent; carbon copies of letters from Kent to newspaper editors, politicians, and political activists, including Harold Kastner, J. Howard McGrath, Senator William Benton, Thomas E. Dewey, Nikita Khrushchev, and others; carbon copies of letters to Kent from Diego Rivera, Eliot White, and others; a copy of a letter from Darwin J. Meserole to Harry S. Truman; letters from Sally Kent and Henriette ("Riette") Kahn, containing newspaper clippings, a typescript of a poem from Rockwell Kent to Riette, a price list with the titles and dimensions of Kent's paintings, and writings by Kahn on Kent; and printed material relating to political activities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: REEL 2300: Correspondence primarily with Kahn and Kent; letters from H. K. Thompson, Jr., Dan Burne Jones, and others; and letters from Kent to Lyndon B. Johnson, Leon Berney, and others. Some letters contain typescripts of writings by Kahn and Kent and printed materials.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reels 2030 and 2300 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals returned to lender, Mrs. Albert Kahn, after microfilming.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Photographer, social activist, and author; Glen Ellen, Calif. Kahn was a close friend of Rockwell Kent.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Lent for microfilming 1980-1981 by Henriette Kahn, Kahn's widow.
